snippet.title: 1428: Shadows over Silesia - Announcement Teaser Trailer (2020)
snippet.description:
Shadows over Silesia is a dark action adventure game set in real medieval Europe. With true historical events in the background, challenging puzzles, difficult battles but also stealth passages and important decisions are waiting for you.

After a successful playtest, the game is leaving its pre-production phase and releasing the first teaser trailer to let people know it’s on the way. 

Add game to your Steam wishlist!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1228500
Web: https://shadows1428.com/
Discord: https://discord.gg/avabBNY
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KUBIGames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/1428_shadows_over_silesia/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/shadows1428
IndieDB: https://www.indiedb.com/games/1428-shadows-over-silesia/

#indiegame #indiegames #gametrailer #indiegametrailer #gameannouncement #steamgames #czechgames #medieval #silesia
